Title: Object: Un muezzin
Series: L'Orient pittoresque
Series: Les Artistes contemporains
Description: On a rooftop, a muezzin stands leading a call to prayer, head tilted upwards, eyes closed; beside him, a man kneels, head lowered in reverence, arms on lap; at far left, a doorway seen; beyond at right, the roofs of buildings including a tower and a dome; published in 'Les Artistes Contemporains'. 1851/52 Lithograph on chine collé
Curator's comments: For Curator's Comment see 1880,0710.183. For more information on the series 'Les Artistes contemporains', see 1889, 0608.477.
Bibliographic references: IFF / Inventaire du Fonds Français: Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des Estampes (17)
Beraldi 1885-92 / Les Graveurs du dix-neuvième siècle (Vol. II, p. 73)
